short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Convert logged workout distances to the unit appropriate for the viewer.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
For members of runnersconnect.net, this extension will display distance and pace units in the same units your workouts are displayed in.

If your workouts are in kilometers, all logged workouts in the activity feed will be displayed in kilometers, regardless of how the workouts are logged.

The work out details (viewed by hovering over the users distance and time) will show the prescribed workout details with miles converted to kilometers and minutes per mile pace converted to minutes per kilometer.

Conversely, members who have their own workouts configured in imperial units will have an activity feed with distances in miles and paces in minutes per mile.

An asterix is inserted in the workout distance and time description for units that were converted by this extension.
